sentences.sContent: She would try to forget her obsession with Christopher.
sentences.sCn: 她会试图忘掉她对克里斯托弗的迷恋。

synos.tran: 痴迷；困扰；[内科][心理]强迫观念

remMethod.val: ob(逆) + sess(=sit坐) + ion → 坐立不安 → 困扰

words.tran: 强迫性的；着迷的；分神的
过分地；着迷地，着魔似地
迷住，缠住；使…着迷；使…困扰

trans.tranCn: 牵挂， 惦念； 迷住， 困扰； 萦绕于心的事物或人； 固执的念头
trans.tranOther: If you say that someone has an obsession with a person or thing, you think they are spending too much time thinking about them
